issue.title: [C++][Compute] Improve quantile kernel for integers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11425](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11425). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For integers within limited value range, a histogram approach is useful to reduce memory footprint and improve performance.

comments.body:
